org.apache.flink.api.common.state

接口 OperatorStateStore

  • 所有已知子接口:
    OperatorStateBackend
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultOperatorStateBackend

    @PublicEvolving
public interface OperatorStateStore
    This interface contains methods for registering operator state with a managed store.

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • getListState

        <S> ListState<S> getListState(ListStateDescriptor<S> stateDescriptor)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates (or restores) a list state. Each state is registered under a unique name. The provided serializer is used to de/serialize the state in case of checkpointing (snapshot/restore).

        Note the semantic differences between an operator list state and a keyed list state (see KeyedStateStore.getListState(ListStateDescriptor)). Under the context of operator state, the list is a collection of state items that are independent from each other and eligible for redistribution across operator instances in case of changed operator parallelism. In other words, these state items are the finest granularity at which non-keyed state can be redistributed, and should not be correlated with each other.

        The redistribution scheme of this list state upon operator rescaling is a round-robin pattern, such that the logical whole state (a concatenation of all the lists of state elements previously managed by each operator before the restore) is evenly divided into as many sublists as there are parallel operators.

        类型参数:
        S - The generic type of the state
        参数:
        stateDescriptor - The descriptor for this state, providing a name and serializer.
        返回:
        A list for all state partitions.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getUnionListState

        <S> ListState<S> getUnionListState(ListStateDescriptor<S> stateDescriptor)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates (or restores) a list state. Each state is registered under a unique name. The provided serializer is used to de/serialize the state in case of checkpointing (snapshot/restore).

        Note the semantic differences between an operator list state and a keyed list state (see KeyedStateStore.getListState(ListStateDescriptor)). Under the context of operator state, the list is a collection of state items that are independent from each other and eligible for redistribution across operator instances in case of changed operator parallelism. In other words, these state items are the finest granularity at which non-keyed state can be redistributed, and should not be correlated with each other.

        The redistribution scheme of this list state upon operator rescaling is a broadcast pattern, such that the logical whole state (a concatenation of all the lists of state elements previously managed by each operator before the restore) is restored to all parallel operators so that each of them will get the union of all state items before the restore.

        类型参数:
        S - The generic type of the state
        参数:
        stateDescriptor - The descriptor for this state, providing a name and serializer.
        返回:
        A list for all state partitions.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getRegisteredStateNames

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getRegisteredStateNames()
        Returns a set with the names of all currently registered states.
        返回:
        set of names for all registered states.

      • getOperatorState

        @Deprecated
<S> ListState<S> getOperatorState(ListStateDescriptor<S> stateDescriptor)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        已过时。 since 1.3.0. This was deprecated as part of a refinement to the function names. Please use getListState(ListStateDescriptor) instead.
        Creates (or restores) a list state. Each state is registered under a unique name. The provided serializer is used to de/serialize the state in case of checkpointing (snapshot/restore). The items in the list are repartitionable by the system in case of changed operator parallelism.
        类型参数:
        S - The generic type of the state
        参数:
        stateDescriptor - The descriptor for this state, providing a name and serializer.
        返回:
        A list for all state partitions.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getSerializableListState

        @Deprecated
<T extends java.io.Serializable> ListState<T> getSerializableListState(java.lang.String stateName)
                                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        已过时。 since 1.3.0. Using Java serialization for persisting state is not encouraged. Please use getListState(ListStateDescriptor) instead.
        Creates a state of the given name that uses Java serialization to persist the state. The items in the list are repartitionable by the system in case of changed operator parallelism.

        This is a simple convenience method. For more flexibility on how state serialization should happen, use the getListState(ListStateDescriptor) method.

        参数:
        stateName - The name of state to create
        返回:
        A list state using Java serialization to serialize state objects.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
